website_summaries.verdict: The Denon HEOS HomeCinema offers discreet looks and a dynamic performance, but it could be easier to use.
pros: The Denon HEOS HomeCinema offers decent home-theater sound and excellent music replay
The device includes more connections than most including an HDMI, Wi-Fi and digital optical, and can even distribute TV audio throughout the house
The number of streaming services is comprehensive
cons: No Bluetooth available out of the box
The app can be convoluted, which is especially frustrating given the lack of a dedicated remote control
Setup requires the use of a cable between your phone and the unit

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and great addition to TV
customer_reviews.text: Most of the negative reviews here are due to the buggy app. Yes, the app has bugs, but overall I found it has improved significantly over the past year (I have a Heos 5 and 7 as well), enough that it no longer bothers me. I subscribed to Spotify premium so I can stream to my Heos devices directly from the Spotify app. The soundbar is an excellent addition to my TV. Huge improvement as the speakers on my Samsung TV are lame. But the thing I was most impressed by was how great it sounded when playing music through it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott.Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sad...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend that supposedly installs them. I listen to him over the reviews, big mistake. Read the reviews and take the warning. The bar is buggy and the app is horrible. For the price I expected more. I have fought this thing for several months, it is just a POS. I am going to try and send it back to Denon for replacement. I'll probably just end up buying a different one and eating the cost of this one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Too bad...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to work for me but unfortunately it's going back.. I was psyched to read Denon finally enabled 'grouping' of this with other Heos speakers and while that works great if you are only streaming music, it did not work well for watching TV. It was WAY(!) out of sync and even though the app (albeit in beta) lets you adjust the Audio Delay from the TV to the Heos (3 & 5) speakers, not one of the adjustments came close to syncing correctly Perhaps in the future they will enhance the Audio Delay feature but no sense in retaining this while they decide to do so or not..
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and buy a better soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable at all. I installed this in a customers home and nothing but problems. No remote so you can't just power cycle it if it freezes up which is what was happening. loss of audio 90% of the time. I've installed 30-40 soundbars and never had an issue like with this brand. They refunded me the money but not the loss of money for the hours this things cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Buffum

customer_reviews.title: good sound, but hampered by the mobile app which ...
customer_reviews.text: Handsome design, good sound, but hampered by the mobile app which is effectively the only way to control it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is very good, however unless you are very patient with how ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, however unless you are very patient with how “wonky” this device is you will be very frustrated. It operates via your wifi with phone app interface...what could go wrong? If you are very tech savvy you will enjoy...if not...good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Punkdad

customer_reviews.title: Pain to connect no remote , app is useless.
customer_reviews.text: I got the heos sound bar with woofer and i have been having issues with the speaker and the app since day one. It disconnects on its own and reconnecting is a pain. Right now after 6 months I changed a wifi and here i am Sitting here without darn speaker bc it won’t reconnect and the app is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sin

customer_reviews.title: Like it.  WIFI connection cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm with excellent sound. Wifi connection instructions are not very clear and it took a little for the bar to sync up and upgrade is software. Once working, it's great .
customer_reviews.author: Volkert Kreuk

customer_reviews.title: I love heos products
customer_reviews.text: I love heos products, but from time to time, this one stops working and I have to restart....especially when I change inputs on the TV. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Wright

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sound/bass.
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Pretty Sound/bass.. but not $799 or $600 worth. I got it for $499 and think this price is acceptable. I use the HomeCinema Soundbar with my LG smart projector. The app control is nice but the app isn't well practicable (not easy to use for beginners).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. We have a very open family room (2-story ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. We have a very open family room (2-story ceiling), and the HEOS system provides great voice projection for TV and music sound as well. 4 starts due to the somewhat confusing setup and difficulty learning remote control signals. I did end up calling their tech support line around 9pm on a weekday and the tech was responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound / Horrible App
customer_reviews.text: Based on the sound quality, I would give this product 5 stars but since their software makes this product barely usable, I almost gave it 1 star. Their latest July update just plain sucks..! Each time I log into the app, my icons are scattered in different locations, never the way I set them up and left them. I added several additional folders to my library, I have yet to figure out how to have Heos update the library. Just about the only thing that works right now is the optic connection to my TV, but otherwise it has become useless. If they don't fix this soon, this will become a very expensive TV only soundbar...
customer_reviews.author: MissouriMK

customer_reviews.title: Big sound! Boom
customer_reviews.text: I tried many sound bars with subs and always disappointed until I purchased this one. The quality of sound is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: If you like watching TV with no sound or skipping audio, then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet powerful. Exactly what I wanted. Sounds amazing and easy to install. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, connects with other HEOS wireless speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound. It's big - highs are crisp and bass is smooth. I have it in a medium-sized living room and it's more than enough. I've not needed to crank it up more than 70 (out of 100) because it's pretty loud - and I like listening to loud music. Also - important to note - New HEOS app allows you to connect the HomeCinema sound bar with other HEOS wireless speakers. I have a HEOS 7 and two HEOS 3's and can group them all together for a full surround sound. ***UPDATE*** - About 90 days after the purchase, bluetooth stopped working. The soundbar can't be detected by devices and can only play using WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Radoslav Ratkovic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple Setup and I think it is better than SONOS. And cheaper too considering it comes with subwoofer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound at the price point. I only wish there were more sound control options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you need to set up your living room sound system.
customer_reviews.text: One I bought on amazon was lost, after amazon took care of that I`ve got one elsewhere, what a wonderful sound system, versatile and has more features than I`d ever be using. Software get update often,improving functionality tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Family Account

customer_reviews.title: Entire system works seamlessly and great whole- house sound
customer_reviews.text: Entire system works seamlessly and great whole- house sound. 72"Sony needed real help with sound and this did it. Did need an AV guy to set the Soundbar up and integrate with DirectvTV, DVD etc though. I tried but gave up....
customer_reviews.author: Brad D.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. But I've had some issues with the Arc Hdmi connection not always working. For instance sometimes I get soundness of the speaker but I cannot change the volume via the TV remote but can still change the sound via the app on my cell phone.. Also sometimes the speaker doesn't work at all and I have to change the setting on my TV back to using the TV speakers. Usually I can turn the TV on/off 2-3 times for it to fix itself. I would return it if I didn't already recycle the box in came in. Hopefully they will release a firmware update soon that will fix these issues
customer_reviews.author: Cory Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Great w/ some limitations.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Sounds great. Occasional bug though hdmi arc connection requires turning tv on/off or intervention thru the app. Would also like google play music and Apple Music support.
customer_reviews.author: DWood

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Likey...
customer_reviews.text: The sound and sub are great. I was a little disappointed to find out you cannot buy additional speakers to creat a surround sound set-up in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Maslyn

customer_reviews.title: Better use a Chromecast audio
customer_reviews.text: I Could say that the sound its ok, nothing spectacular for a Denon product. Really i expect much more. The real problem is the app; it doesnt work. Its very deceptive. I regret not buying a Sonos or other more reliable product. Denon has a lot of work if want a bigger share of wireless sound market. I would recomment to anybody, expend more in a more reliable product. I would give a chance to Sonos or bluesound, even a Chromecast audio...... I love Denon receivers, but the cinema soundbar was a mistake. Update: After hours trying the app, finally works......using a Chromecast audio......
customer_reviews.author: GGTColombia

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this piece of garbage. DONOTDONOTDONOT
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this piece of garbage. DONOTDONOTDONOT. It comes with no controller(you have to get the app) and they tell you to connect it to a network so you can use the controller app with it. See a lack of logic here? How does one connect it to the network when they don't have a controller to use with i? Waste of money and total pain in the ass to set up. Was a big Denon fan, but they lost me here.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Milfner

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound but horribly unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar regularly dies when the TV starts and tries to connect. The firmware is just terrible and the soundbar itself required regular restarting (which given that there's no on/off means unplugging and plugging it back in). The app is pretty terrible too. Well, after three years of putting up with it (because the sound really was decent) it finally came to an end. Randomly one day it started flashing like I needed to reset it and after trying multiple times, nothing worked. I'm not sad that I'll finally be replacing it but I'm pretty mad at the amount of cash I dropped on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: kk12345

customer_reviews.title: Denon is really good sounding affordable home cinema
customer_reviews.text: Comparing with anything up to 1000$ Denon provides the best sonic quality. Also, in the app it would be great if they would add memory button for settings related to grouped loudspeakers, HEOS soundbar and CEOL system. So for example, one setting would regulated volume and EQ for TV and movies. Another music. Let say 3 memory options. It shouldn't be very complicate. Other than that the app is truly brilliant and the best part of the system. I believe they polished it now in 2019. This is clearly the future of home audio, compared to old system. And sound is really pleasant and full.
customer_reviews.author: Dalle

customer_reviews.title: superior sound
customer_reviews.text: 2 years ago i bought the andrew jones pioneer sound bar for my bedroom and was very happy with it since that time i've gotten several HEOS speakers and receiver and wanted the home cinema sound bar and subwoofer the pioneer was good, the denon is so superior that it knocked my socks off sound quality, voice quality, superior staging, clarity were all superior .... yes it's costly but you can get a refurbished one at denon for 1/2 price i highly recommend it and the best thing, once i connected the sound bar to the heos app, the sub auto connected so it worked with minimal effort thanks denon, great job here
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money and time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sound bar for 3 years. The sound is great, the app is kinda clunky. The biggest flaw is the connectivity. If you can’t connect to your WiFi, you don’t have sound. Occasionally, you’ll lose your connection, and it is be frustrating to get back online. When you try every different way to connect your speaker, and 3 hours later all you have is a yellow light and no sound, you get angry. I just moved into a new house, last thing I want to worry about is my $400 speaker connecting to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Fickle

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: this product is bad. sound is ok but it disconnects all the time so NO sound. Paid all this money for crap. Even my installer who is a Pro would not buy. I should have listen to him and not purchased this Denon Heos
customer_reviews.author: john P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, both from a sound and ease of set up perspective. Opening the box to listening to my tv through the soundbar took about 15 minutes (including a software update). The sound quality is outstanding and I was able to switch from my tv to music on Spotify seamlessly. This is a great product and integrates perfectly into the rest of the HEOS lineup. This will not only be a soundbar for me, but will be the main speaker for music in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jrosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to surround sound
customer_reviews.text: Just picked up this unit from a box store. I am loving it so far. The app is great and setup wasn't too bad. I had a bit of an issue during setup but that was my fault. I initially thought it was necessary to setup multiple phones in order to use the volume controls. It's not. I love the fact I can stream music on the speakers from any where in my house. Its really nice when you're going to bed and your kid has it turned up too loud...I just turn it down and go to sleep! Keep in mind I was going from a decent Bose surround. I'm pleasantly surprised how this speaker setup sounds.
customer_reviews.author: James White

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Do not buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to set up. App to use it is garbage and continuously crashes. Sound bar turns off and on at random times. Lights on the front flash and sound stops. Total garbage. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Riha

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!! High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Owned other sound bars, but this one truly sounds the best. The setup is a little quirky, but the quality of soundscape is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: RoBro

customer_reviews.title: For music the Heos is extraordinary awesome! Sound is perfect, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have a big problem with the Heos HomeCinema in combination with amazon prime instant video and the Amazon FireTV Stick. If i choose DolbyDigital Plus, the Heos Soundbar can't handle it. It just comes any noise out of the HomeCinema. If i choose "Stereo" in the FireTV Stick, then i can hear the normal Sound. But with "stereo" there is no Virtual surround sound then. For music the Heos is extraordinary awesome! Sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jens Mekiska

customer_reviews.title: We love our new HEOS HomeCinema system
customer_reviews.text: We love our new HEOS HomeCinema system. It connects to our other HEOS speakers wirelessly (we now have a HEOS speaker in almost every room). Only wish there were outdoor versions of the other speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the unit came with its own remote
customer_reviews.text: Especially for music, this soundbar is superb. It would be nice if the unit came with its own remote. Basic functions can be easily synced with your television remote. The app was an easy set up, from it you can choose the specific sound settings. I am very pleased so fat.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hembree

customer_reviews.title: Worst product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Worst product for the money. Bought it a month ago. It's worked a handful of days. Subwoofer disconnects constantly. Sometimes need phone to hear sound on the tv. Non existent support from their staff. Their level 2 techs just say reboot it and it should work. Also the iphone app is bad. cant skip forward within a song. Sometimes songs stop playing mid song. total mess. decent sound when it occasionally works.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goodman

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing. Both TV and streaming via wifi ( pandora ...
customer_reviews.text: After much research ( Sony, Sonos etc..), I purchased the Denon Heos home cinema soundbar last week (Aug 2015). The sound quality is amazing. Both TV and streaming via wifi ( pandora or iheart radio etc). The heos app on my ipad and iphone is really awesome. They took what sonos had since 2012 and made it better, additionally you get the bar and sub woofer for the same price as what sonos charges for just the soundbar. I had to call tech support initially for questions about my TV and ARC, got answered immediately with great support. I highly recommend this product, the sound clarity is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence S Stern

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Wish I never purchased it
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well. Always has trouble connecting to both the tv and wireless network. Updates itself constantly and you have to go through entire setup every time it does. Horrible. Sound quality is mediocre as well. Not worth purchasing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lichtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Simply not working
customer_reviews.text: Ipad (wifi) connects to the soundbar (cabled), but when running the heos app set up guide the soundbar won't connect to tv using hdmi arc or spdif. I have tried different cables, turning everything on/off, etc. No sound comes out when playing Spotify. No sound when connecting any of the inputs.
